verses.verse: And Abraham <WH85> journeyed <WH5265> from there <WH8033> toward the south <WH5045> country, <WH776> and dwelled <WH3427> between <WH996> Kadesh <WH6946> and Shur, <WH7793> and sojourned <WH1481> in Gerar. <WH1642>
And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> of Sarah <WH8283> his wife, <WH802> She is my sister: <WH269> and Abimelech <WH40> king <WH4428> of Gerar <WH1642> sent, <WH7971> and took <WH3947> Sarah. <WH8283>

But God <WH430> came <WH935> to Abimelech <WH40> in a dream <WH2472> by night, <WH3915> and said <WH559> to him, Behold, <WH2009> you are but a dead <WH4191> man, for the woman <WH802> which <WH834> you have taken; <WH3947> for she is a man's <WH1167> wife. <WH1166>
But Abimelech <WH40> had not come <WH7126> near <WH7126> her: and he said, <WH559> LORD, <WH136> will you slay <WH2026> also <WH1571> a righteous <WH6662> nation? <WH1471>

Said <WH559> he not to me, She is my sister? <WH269> and she, even <WH1571> she herself said, <WH559> He is my brother: <WH251> in the integrity <WH8537> of my heart <WH3824> and innocence <WH5356> of my hands <WH3709> have I done <WH6213> this. <WH2063>

And God <WH430> said <WH559> to him in a dream, <WH2472> Yes, <WH1571> I know <WH3045> that you did <WH6213> this <WH2063> in the integrity <WH8537> of your heart; <WH3824> for I also <WH1571> withheld <WH2820> you from sinning <WH2398> against me: therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> suffered <WH5414> I you not to touch <WH5060> her.

Now <WH6258> therefore restore <WH7725> the man <WH376> his wife; <WH802> for he is a prophet, <WH5030> and he shall pray <WH6419> for you, and you shall live: <WH2421> and if <WH518> you restore <WH7725> her not, know <WH3045> you that you shall surely <WH3588> die, <WH4191> you, and all <WH3605> that are yours.

Therefore Abimelech <WH40> rose <WH7925> early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and called <WH7121> all <WH3605> his servants, <WH5650> and told <WH1696> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things <WH1697> in their ears: <WH241> and the men <WH582> were sore <WH3966> afraid. <WH3372>

Then Abimelech <WH40> called <WH7121> Abraham, <WH85> and said <WH559> to him, What <WH4100> have you done <WH6213> to us? and what <WH4100> have I offended <WH2398> you, that you have brought <WH935> on <WH5921> me and on <WH5921> my kingdom <WH4467> a great <WH1419> sin? <WH2401> you have done <WH6213> deeds <WH4639> to me that ought not to be done. <WH6213>
And Abimelech <WH40> said <WH559> to Abraham, <WH85> What <WH4100> saw <WH7200> you, that you have done <WH6213> this <WH2088> thing? <WH1697>

And Abraham <WH85> said, <WH559> Because <WH3588> I thought, <WH559> Surely <WH7535> the fear <WH3374> of God <WH430> is not in this <WH2088> place; <WH4725> and they will slay <WH2026> me for my wife's <WH802> sake. <WH1697>
And yet <WH1571> indeed <WH546> she is my sister; <WH269> she is the daughter <WH1323> of my father, <WH1> but not the daughter <WH1323> of my mother; <WH517> and she became <WH1961> my wife. <WH802>

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when <WH834> God <WH430> caused me to wander <WH8582> from my father's <WH1> house, <WH1004> that I said <WH559> to her, This <WH2088> is your kindness <WH2617> which <WH834> you shall show <WH6213> to me; at <WH413> every <WH3605> place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> we shall come, <WH935> say <WH559> of me, He is my brother. <WH251>

And Abimelech <WH40> took <WH3947> sheep, <WH6629> and oxen, <WH1241> and menservants, <WH5650> and womenservants, <WH8198> and gave <WH5414> them to Abraham, <WH85> and restored <WH7725> him Sarah <WH8283> his wife. <WH802>
And Abimelech <WH40> said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> my land <WH776> is before <WH6440> you: dwell <WH3427> where it pleases <WH2896> <WH5869> you.

And to Sarah <WH8283> he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I have given <WH5414> your brother <WH251> a thousand <WH505> pieces of silver: <WH3701> behold, <WH2009> he is to you a covering <WH3682> of the eyes, <WH5869> to all <WH3605> that are with you, and with all <WH3605> other: thus she was reproved. <WH3198>
So Abraham <WH85> prayed <WH6419> to God: <WH430> and God <WH430> healed <WH7495> Abimelech, <WH40> and his wife, <WH802> and his maidservants; <WH519> and they bore <WH3205> children.
For the LORD <WH3068> had fast closed <WH6113> up all <WH3605> the wombs <WH7358> of the house <WH1004> of Abimelech, <WH40> because <WH5921> <WH1697> of Sarah <WH8283> Abraham's <WH85> wife. <WH802>
